name: The Jarl's Heritage
description:
Currently trying to resolve a problem that occurs with the inventory when the game-window is double-clicked in browser. It's an issue with a UI element that does not occur on desktop.

The Jarl's Heritage

Made in one week for the 7 Day Roguelike Challenge, in March 2018

How to play:

Move with the arrow keys. Activate abilities with number keys 1 to 5. Some abilities require you to input a direction as well. Loot and equip new items to acquire new abilities. This game is turn-based; Enemies move when you do, and it is not possible to dodge abilities through fast reactions. Press space to skip a turn.

Music by DJ PLENGO soundcloud.com/djplengo

Made with the Godot engine
